pages.text: The $(mob)Wither Cow$() is a monster that spawns in the $(thing)Nether$(). It attacks players on sight, inflicting $(thing)Wither$() with its attacks, and projecting an aura that afflicts all creatures within 4 blocks with $(thing)Slowness$(). It is immune to $(thing)Wither$(), Fire, and knockback. When a $(mob)Wither Cow$() dies, it leaves behind a lingering $(thing)Wither$() potion effect.
$(mob)Wither Cows$() drop $(item)Nether Quartz$() or $(item)Glowstone Dust$() on death, which are useful for many crafting recipes, potions and blocks.
$(mob)Wither Cows$() drop $(item)Withered Brains$() on death, which is a decent but dangerous food source as it may inflict $(thing)Wither$() on players when consumed.
